steps.title: Contact & Discuss
steps.description: Call, WhatsApp, or book online to discuss your Cardiff media wall vision. We'll talk through your requirements, room dimensions, and style preferences.

steps.title: Professional Assessment & 3D Modeling
steps.description: We visit your Cardiff property for a detailed survey & measurements. Using advanced design, we create a detailed 3D computer model bringing your media wall to life before installation begins.

steps.title: Choose Your Perfect Components
steps.description: Visit our Cardiff showroom to see electric fires in person, or we'll guide you through options. We'll help you select the ideal fire, finishes, storage solutions, and lighting to match your home.

steps.title: Expert 3-Day Installation
steps.description: Our experienced team transforms your Cardiff living space with minimal disruption. Complete timber frame construction, electrical installation, all wiring concealed, & professional finishing. Most installations complete in 3 days.

steps.title: Enjoy Your Media Wall
steps.description: Full demonstration of your media wall features and controls. Comprehensive aftercare support and guidance. We're always here if you need us - based right here in Cardiff.
